Verses: 1 aadhimudhalaai Irundhadhum, Naangal Kettadhum, Engal Kangalinaale Kandadhum, Naangal Nokkippaarththadhum, Engal Kaigalinaale Thottuppaarththadhumaayirukkira Jeevavaarththaiyaik Kuriththu Ungalukku Arivikkirom.

2 andha Jeevan Velippattadhu; Pidhaavinidaththilirundhadhum, Engalukku Velippattadhumaana Niththiyamaayirukkira Andha Jeevanai Naangal Kandu, Adhaikkuriththu Saatchikkoduththu, Adhai Ungalukku Arivikkirom.
3 neengalum Engalode Aikkiyamullavargalaagumpadi, Naangal Kandum Kettum Irukkiradhai Ungalukkum Arivikkirom; Engaludaiya Aikkiyam Pidhaavodum Avarudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Yesukiristhuvodum Irukkiradhu.
4 ungal Sandhosham Niraivaayirukkumpadi Ivaigalai Ungalukku Ezhudhugiren.
5 dhevan Oliyaayirukkiraar, Avaril Evvalavenum Irulillai; Idhu Naangal Avaridaththil Kettu, Ungalukku Arivikkira Viseshamaayirukkiradhu.
6 naam Avarode Aikkiyappattavargal Endru Solliyum, Irulile Nadakkiravargalaayirundhaal, Saththiyaththinpadi Nadavaamal Poisollugiravargalaayiruppom.
7 avar Oliyilirukkiradhupola Naamum Oliyile Nadandhaal Oruvarodoruvar Aikkiyappattiruppom; Avarudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Yesukiristhuvin Raththam Sagala Paavangalaiyum Neekki, Nammai Suththigarikkum.
8 namakkup Paavamillaiyenbomaanaal Nammai Naame Vanjikkiravargalaayiruppom, Saththiyam Namakkul Iraadhu.
9 nammudaiya Paavangalai Naam Arikkaiyittaal, Paavangalai Namakku Manniththu Ellaa Aniyaayaththaiyum Neekki Nammai Suththigarippadharku Avar Unmaiyum Needhiyum Ullavaraayirukkiraar.
10 naam Paavancheyyavillaiyenbomaanaal, Naam Avaraip Poiyaraakkugiravargalaayiruppom, Avarudaiya Vaarththai Namakkul Iraadhu.
